channel.title: KTVZ - NewsChannel 21 | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/KTVZ21/

item.title: Biden administration announces expansion of maternal home vi
item.description: Biden administration announces expansion of maternal home visit programs.

item.title: SpaceX’s prolific Falcon 9 rocket has been grounded for the
item.description: SpaceX’s prolific Falcon 9 rocket has been grounded for the second time in two months after federal regulators said they wanted to review a wayward landing attempt that occurred this morning.

item.title: UPDATE: Police say a 21-year-old Bend man seriously injured
item.description: UPDATE: Police say a 21-year-old Bend man seriously injured in the rollover crash of his motorcycle on the Bend Parkway last night has been cited for DUII-alcohol.
